title: Early-Stage Biosynthesis of Phenalinolactone Diterpenoids Involves Sequential Prenylation, Epoxidation, and Cyclization
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00138A, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Tyler Alsup, Zining Li, Caitlin A McCadden, Annika Jagels, Diana Łomowska-Keehner, Erin Marshall, Liao-Bin Dong, Sandra Loesgen, Jeffrey D Rudolf
The chemical logic associated with assembly of many bacterial terpenoids remains poorly understood. We focused our efforts on the early-stage biosynthesis of the phenalinolactone diterpenoids, demonstrating that the anti/anti/syn-perhydrophenanthrene core...
